## Oh no! A big, perfect space for camping! We can't go over it, we can't go under it, we gotta stay in it! (WOW points!)

Using the GitHub repository[^1]

[^1]: https://github.com/jemimahcharles/sds192-mini3.git

```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(htmltools)


trails <- macleish_layers[["streams"]] %>%
  mutate(computed_length = st_length(geometry))

stream_buffer <- macleish_layers[["streams"]] %>%
  st_transform(proj4_aea) %>%
  st_buffer(dist = 60.96) %>%
  st_transform(4326)

research_buffer <- macleish_layers[["research"]]%>%
  st_transform(proj4_aea) %>%
  st_buffer(dist = 152.4) %>%
  st_transform(4326)

challenge_buffer <- macleish_layers[["challenge_courses"]]%>%
  st_transform(proj4_aea) %>%
  st_buffer(dist = 152.4) %>%
  st_transform(4326)

parking_buffer <- parking_lot %>%
  st_transform(proj4_aea) %>%
  st_buffer(dist = 804.672) %>%
  st_transform(4326)

#Coordinates of campsites and parking lot
camp_park_points <- tribble(
  ~point, ~lat, ~lon,
  "Group Camp ", 42.450976, -72.678154,
  "Remote Camp", 42.458549, -72.679581,
  "Parking Lot", 42.448013, -72.680663
)

#Converting camp and park coordinates into a sf object
camp_park_sf <- camp_park_points %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lat", "lon"))
  


proj4_aea <- "+proj=aea +lat_1=29.5 +lat_2=45.5 +lat_0=37.5 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs"

boundaries_aea <- macleish_layers[["boundary"]] %>%
  st_transform(proj4_aea)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["forests"]], 
              weight = 1, fillOpacity =  0, color = "green", popup = ~ Sheet1__Na)%>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_layers[["streams"]], color = "blue")%>%
  addPolygons(data = stream_buffer, fillOpacity = 0, weight = 1) %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_layers[["trails"]], color = "black")%>%
  addPolygons(data = macleish_layers[["buildings"]], 
              weight = 1, popup = ~name) %>%
  addPolylines(data = macleish_layers[["research"]], color = "brown")%>%
  addPolygons(data = research_buffer, fillOpacity = 0, color = "brown", weight = 1) %>%
  addMarkers(data=macleish_layers[["challenge_courses"]], popup = ~geometry, ) %>%
  addPolygons(data = challenge_buffer, fillOpacity = 0, color = "red", weight = 1) %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, data = remote_camp, popup = "Remote Campsite") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, data = group_camp, popup = "Group Campsite") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, data = parking_lot, popup = "Parking Lot") %>%
  addPolygons(data = challenge_buffer, fillOpacity = 0, color = "red", weight = 1)

```
